title: Valid Parentheses
statement: Given a string containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid. A string is valid if: open brackets are closed by the same type of brackets, and open brackets are closed in the correct order.
input_format: A single line containing the string of brackets.
output_format: Print 'YES' if the string is valid, otherwise 'NO'.
